author: Timothy Ferriss
title: The 4-Hour WorkWeek
description: Forget the old concept of retirement and the rest of the deferred-life planâ€“there is no need to wait and every reason not to, especially in unpredictable economic times. Whether your dream is escaping the rat race, experiencing high-end world travel, or earning a monthly five-figure income with zero management, The 4-Hour Workweek is the blueprint.
